goals__remit:
Fundació ENT is a private foundation, acting as research centre focused on environmental innovation. It was created in january 2011. 
 
ENT is based in Vilanova i la Geltrú (Barcelona, Spain) and it is formed by experienced engineers, graduates, postgraduates and PhDs from different fields related to environmental management, including industrial engineers, environmental scientists, and ecological and environmental economists, among others (more information can be found at www.ent.cat). 
 
ENT’s mission is to contribute towards a socially, environmentally and economically sustainable society by studying and implementing innovative ideas and projects. Our projects range from local to international level. We mainly work for and collaborate with Public Administrations, although our clients also include Universities and the private sector (companies, trade unions, NGOs, foundations, etc.).
